Reference: Jouquet                          2011 J Acquir Immune Defic Syndr
Ratio Description: Tenofovir (TDF) VERSUS Stavudine (d4T)-based regimens IN HIV-positive patients starting on antiretroviral therapy (ART) in Lesotho
Target Population: HIV-positive patients starting on antiretroviral therapy (ART) in Lesotho
Title: Cost and cost-effectiveness of switching from d4T or AZT to a TDF-based first-line regimen in a resource-limited setting in rural Lesotho.

Reference: Jouquet                          2011 J Acquir Immune Defic Syndr
Ratio Description: Zidovudine VERSUS Stavudine (d4T)-based regimens + Tenofovir (TDF) IN HIV-positive patients starting on antiretroviral therapy (ART) in Lesotho
Target Population: HIV-positive patients starting on antiretroviral therapy (ART) in Lesotho
Title: Cost and cost-effectiveness of switching from d4T or AZT to a TDF-based first-line regimen in a resource-limited setting in rural Lesotho.
